Magic Notes:
School Specialization (Evocation): Extra Evocation spell/dy each spell level
Arcane Spell Failure: 15%
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Craft Rod: Create magic rod
Craft Staff: Create magic staff
Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
School Opposition (Abjuration): Cannot learn or cast Abjuration spells
School Opposition (Conjuration): Cannot learn or cast Conjuration spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Companions
Familiar: Tiny Viper "Ofeme"
Str: 4 (-3) Dex: 17 (+3) Con: 11 (+0) Int: 14 (+2) Wis: 12 (+1) Cha: 2 (-4) Size: T Speed: 15
HD/HP: 17/31 Init: +3 AC: 26 Attack: +13 1 Fort/Ref/Will: +5/+8/+11
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions w/in 1 mile
Scry On Familiar: Master views companion 1/dy
Share Spells: R5' Master share self spell w/companion
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
